case.state: No way, she brought a chest with her? That smells like riches to me!
Hey, it's my company's anniversary today! So you should celebrate by playing our games!
Hey, what am I doing here? I'm supposed to be throwing an anniversary party for my company today.
Trying to steal my name, eh? No one impersonates Wario and gets away with it!
What do you think you're doing, punk? No one steals Wario's name!
You're trying to steal my name!? Who do you think you are, buster!?
You call yourself Mario? You don't look like any Mario I know.
It's-a me, Wario! Are we gonna play some poker or what?
Hey, stooges! It's-a Wario!
You invited me to play poker? Great idea!
You chumps ready for some poker? You'd better be!
Hey, look at that huge chest! Imagine how much treasure's in that thing!
Get a load of this guy. He looks like almost as much of a boss as me!
Hmmm... Don't I know you from somewhere?
~Smash_fighter~ looks familiar. But I fight a lot of identical-looking goons.
I feel like I've fought ~smash_fighter~ before, but I get into a lot of fights.
Hey, it's ~mario_char~! This time, we can party with some poker!
Oh yeah, I'm ready for some more Wario Party!
I should've expected ~mario_char~ to play some poker since we compete in everything else, too.
You're leaving already!? But we just started!
Just the three of us? What gives? That's no party.
What kind of worthless party has less than four players!?
Heh-heh, this should be easy money!
Let's-a go!
What? It's strip poker? Fine.
Eh? Strip poker? Eh, whatever.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, chump.
This hand's already as perfect as me!
This hand's perfect already, just like Wario!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, chump.
Wario time!
Let's get this over with.
I'll take ~cards.text~.
Wah-ha-ha! What a hand!
Ha ha! How do you like me now?
Nice, very nice!
That's it! Now that's the kind of hand a guy like me deserves!
Ha ha! You wish you were as brilliant as Wario!
Prepare to be amazed, suckers!
Wouldn't it be nice if we were playing for money right now?
I could've used this luck in a real poker game.
Eh, good enough.
That should do it.
Yeah, sure, why not?
Don't mind if I do.
Ah, I suppose.
What!? This hand's terrible!

state.text: This stinks!

case.state: No way!

state.text: I hate it, I hate it, I hate it!

case.state: This dealer stinks! Where's the new one?
Hey, dealer! Don't forget how fast I can hurl you across the venue!
This place stinks. If they didn't have free food and drink, I wouldn't waste my time here.
This place is so crummy, I'd have left a long time ago if not for the free food.
At least they have free food. If it weren't for that, I wouldn't waste a second here.
I play my games, Wario Land and WarioWare! And you should check them out, too.
Oh, I forgot about my gloves. Ah, I might as well.
My gloves are still on. You know what, I don't need 'em.
Oh, I've still got my gloves. Might as well take them off, too. I'll beat you jokers all the same.
A gimmick, you say? Sure, let's shake things up!
No bets? Oh, it's strip poker. What a waste.
We're playing strip poker? Fine, I'll play anyway.
We're not playing for money? Who plays poker for fun?
That depends--do we get to keep the treasure we find?
Usually overwhelming them with my awesome strength works fine! If not, playing hit and run usually works instead.

state.text: If you can't take 'em out with power alone, hit and run tactics are your friend! Make yourself harder to hit than you look!

case.state: I can never shake the theme song of that "Mona Pizza" joint. Did they have to make it so catchy?
Penny's got one like that. That one's so good, we uploaded it to the internet ourselves!
Dribble and Spitz always hear songs like that on the radio. Sometimes they even use them as background music for their microgames.
Bah! As if you're perfect in every way! Your body could never be as perfect as Wario's!
Ha! You couldn't make me look better if you tried! Nor are you as awesome and manly as me!
Garlic, of course! I can't get enough of it.

state.text: My favorite snack is garlic! Sometimes it even turns me into a superhero!

case.state: I play poker all the time! But usually it's for money.
Not strip poker, but I I've made some cash playing poker.
I've made a killing playing regular poker! Strip poker, not so much.
Stupid-looking? Nonsense! I can think of a red one that looks way dumber!
Eh, looks better than certain red caps I've seen.
All the time! That Golden Pyramid was my best one yet!
If you think you can fill my stomach, sure! I'd never refuse free food!
Only the games featuring me, Wario! And you should play my games, too!
I play my games, Wario Land and WarioWare! And you should check them out, too!
Wah, who cares? I just eat the stuff whole.
Dishes? Who has time for that? I just eat the whole cloves.
We're not standing on a thin floor, are we? If ~zombie~ touches me, I could fall right through!

If I had a coin for every time I've seen a dog playing poker, I'd have three coins.
...Or make it two, I don't think the dog's playing.

I saved an entire world from a tyrannical pirate called the Shake King once. I came back with the treasure the queen promised me--a bottomless coin sack that never runs out--just for Captain Syrup to take it from me!
What a waste of my time. Who plays poker for fun anyway?
I wonder how far I could throw ~small_target~. I bet I could play a killer game of golf using ~small_target.ifMale(him|her)~ as the ball!
You might have been told smart people have more wrinkles in their brains. But that's a huge lieâ€”using your brain depletes its capacity and makes it shrivel up!
I don't know how I got cavities that one time. Eating the bacteria that cause them usually works fine.
Nobody has stronger arms than me! My muscles are made of garlic! Why? Because I said so.
I don't trust that ~pirate~. My last encounter with pirates ended with a bottomless coin sack stolen right out of my hands.
Eh, I've stolen stuff from pirates like ~pirate~ before. But I could also look somewhere else so I don't have pirates trying to take their treasure back from me.
Why do I hear so much talk about me dying in a car crash? Do I look dead to you?
I'd play poker with Waluigi more often, but he somehow loses when I don't even look at the cards.
Believe it or not, I'm not as rich as my games would have you believe because I spend too much of my treasure on food!
Whenever Waluigi starts doing something stupid, I like to just stand and watch him make a new "Waluigi moment."
One time, Waluigi bought me some cheap tickets to a "desert island" which was really in the middle of a boating lake. The "hotel" was a crummy shack full of ducks!
I could cheat if I wanted, but why waste the effort without money on the line?
Anything's possible if you cheat, but why bother if there's no money in it?
I can crush an apple with these hands, no problem! But even better than that, they're incredible for nose-picking!

state.text: What's that? You think I look fat, and my quadruple chin looks like a waterfall of flab? Shut up!

case.state: My feet smell the best! I knocked out a couple of roaches the other day with my wonderful foot odor!
I've heard people call my stomach a black hole. Not to toot my own horn, but I've never thrown up before. Why waste your food by tossing it back out?
This stomach is split into squares by the muscle I've got in there! Don't believe the punk telling you it's split into squares of pure fat.
Come on, come on, drop it and play.

state.text: Let go of it and play. I've got stuff to do.

case.state: Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... Mona's worked just about very job in Diamond City. Her microgames are usually strange or about life.
Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... there's Jimmy T, Club Sugar's number-one patron. Besides dancing, he's all about sports and fitness.
Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... we have Kat and Ana, the twin ninjas. They make it clear in their microgames that they love nature.
Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... Dribble and Spitz are cabbies for Diamond Taxi. Their car can go to space, which inspires their fantasy microgames.
Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... there's Ashley and her pal Red. When not sitting in front of a spell book, their appetites rival mine, so their games are about food.
Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... Young Cricket and Master Mantis are pros at kung fu! But they train in the strangest ways.
Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... we have Dr. Crygor and his granddaughter Penny. Their inventions are as high-tech as their microgames!
Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... Orbulon's an alien who decided to settle down on our planet instead of taking it over. His games are usually about puzzles or culture.

Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... our newest member is Lulu, the kid who took the Pot of Luxeville back after I stole it from them a while ago. No hard feelings, apparently.
Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... sometimes Crygor's robot Mike and 9-Volt's pet Fronk make some games, too. Theirs use a microphone or are super short!
Because I'm so nice, I'll tell you about my crew. Let's see... 9-Volt, his mom 5-Volt, and his friend 18-Volt are all huge fans of Nintendo! Even you chumps could guess what games they make.
You know, I'm something of an artist myself! But nobody seems to appreciate my masterpieces.
None of you are cheating, are you? I can't imagine why you would if there's no money on the line.
(Is ~cheater~ messing with the cards? But why? They won't get any money anyway.)
So what do you chumps like to listen to while working out? My go-to is country.
How much can you all bench? I can do over 400 pounds!
My mother used to say, "you can never have enough cash." So I stuffed her in the kitchen bin and pilfered all her money!
Hey, ~gamer~! You play games, right? How would you like to try my new game, WarioWare?
You, ~gamer~! You look like the perfect type of person to check out my new game, WarioWare!
Somebody cheated! I can't lose!
Yeah sure, whatever. Since I have the time, let me tell you losers about microgames!
Yeah, whatever. Hey, since I have your attention, my company's got a new game, WarioWare!
Uh-huh, sure. Anyway, my company's new game, WarioWare is finally ready!
Eh, I'm still crushing you chumps.
So what? I'm still better off than you losers.
So little left and I'm still crushing you? I guess I won't complain.
Eh, I'll crush you next time.
I'm not done yet! You chumps will see!
So little left and you're all doing better than me? You're all cheating, aren't you!?
Wah, I'm running out of chances to keep up!
Alright, I still have time to crush you losers.
It's not just any game! It's all about microgames!
Unlike the long, mind-numbing trudges everyone else makes, my game's about microgames!
Ah, fine, fine. I'll play along.
And you, yes, lucky you, should play it! What's it about? Microgames!
Microgames are simple! All you need to do is what my game tells you! Think fast and act fast to win! That's how microgames work!
Microgames are perfect for bozos like you! Why? They tell you what to do! But you've got to do it fast to win! That's what microgames are!
Well, it's time for the moment you've all been waiting for!
Yeah yeah, I'll strip. Ready for this? Try not to drool on yourself!
Ah, haven't seen enough of Wario, eh? Well, who am I to disappoint?
I know what's going on now! You're all cheating to win my clothes!
Games for your people? Excellent! Tell all your friends about my games, then!
D'oh... whatever, try out my game anyway!
(Wait a minute, ~gamer~ looks like ~gamer.ifMale(he|she)~ plays a bunch of games! Now's my chance for some promotion!)
(Hey, ~gamer~ plays games, right? Now's my chance to sell some more games!)
Fine then! That's better than losing my money to you cheaters!
Whatever. If I'm losing like this, I'd rather lose my clothes than my money.
(Wait... this could be my chance to advertise my new game!)
(Hold on, I could make some profit selling my game to these saps!)
Eh? You don't know what microgames are? Fine, I'll show you later.
You say you've never heard of them? Well, I'll just have to show you.
Any questions? Of course not! Now that you know how to play, go and buy it!
Get it? Of course you do! Now go and buy my game!
Well, what do you think!? I'm pretty manly, huh? What do you mean, I'm making you sick?
Well? Pretty good, eh? Just try to focus on the game now!
Of course it's themed after me! Who do you take me for?
Of course my logo's on it! Because I'm not a chump like you!
Of course it's branded for me! You say most people don't do that? Most people are chumps.

state.text: If the great Wario's already like this, then you will be soon, too, loser!

case.state: So now you've decided you want to be on display, too, eh?
So ~name~'s up? Let's see what that chump's got.
~Name~ time, eh? I wonder what he's got for me!

state.text: I think someone was a little too focused on me, Wario!

case.state: Ha! ~Name~'s on the ropes!
So, what's it gonna be, cowgirl?
Are you gonna do this each time? You're crazy!
Yeah, yeah, we get it. Just hurry up and shoot them off already.
Now it's your turn, loser.
Whatever you're doing, keep going. You'll have lost in no time!
~Name~'s up? Let's see if she's got something good for Wario.
What's ~name~ got for us? Whatever it is, can I have it?
Hey, ~name~! Try looking at me a little less and maybe you'll win a bit more!
~name~ looks distracted now! I'm a genius!
Woah! That almost never happens!
Everyone who tied loses, right? No? What a waste of time.
No way, you're removing something small now?
Some of us are like this and you're only removing that?
Still have more treasures? I'll let it slide if it's worth something.
If I wait just long enough, I bet I could make a quick buck off of his ~clothing~.
Betting your least valuable items first? Fair enough, I guess.
Don't bring anything with you that you aren't prepared to lose! Heh heh!
You'd better hope you don't have as many things left as it looks.
Well, if it's worth something, heh...
Got any more thingies for me?
Why wear little things like that, anyway? You could decorate your walls with things you could look at instead.
I wonder how much ~clothing.ifPlural(those are|that's)~ worth...
Try not to fall apart after losing so much, chump.
You've still got little things to get rid of? You must collect as much treasure as I do!
Your body is like my garage! It's coated in treasure!
Looks like ~name~'s got some trinkets. I wonder if she collects as many as I do!
If you don't want to keep ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, I'll take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ for you!
Here's an adventuring tip! Don't take anything with you if you don't want to lose it! Heh heh!
A bounty, eh? That could make me some quick cash. Or not, I don't need another pirate to try to get her revenge on me.
I didn't think you'd actually fall apart! What kind of manic mechanic put you together?
Maybe I should just make off with ~name~'s stuff instead. Why wait?

state.text: Got any more junk left? I'd be a shame for it all to "disappear."

case.state: How rare ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ your ~clothing~? Just wondering.
Maybe I don't need ~name~'s money. If her ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ worth anything, that could do!
I think ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ would look much better in my pockets!
Just toss ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ aside already. I don't have all day.
Got any cash in there? Just wondering.
I'll bet you're pretty happy we're not betting money. I can't relate.
Have you got all day? Good for you. Now make it quick.
If taking it slow means you find more treasure, I guess you can take your time.
Getting cozy? Might as well, clearly you'll be here for a while.
Just make it quick. My TV can't watch itself.
Hurry up, will you?
Alright, next thing, let's-a go.
Thbbbtt! Thanks.
I can almost see the treasure disappearing behind you slowpokes.
Ah, I suppose I'll take it.
How'd that bee get in here!? Keep it away, I'm allergic!
You can turn into a zombie, too? I thought I was the only one!
Trying to show up the great Wario, huh? Try it, punk.
(I'll bet that's where she keeps her money. Eh, I can take it now and look later)
We could have played for cash. But lucky you, we aren't.
Now you're a little closer to Wario's level!
Finally giving up your ~clothing~? I wonder if people would buy ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ if I said ~clothing.ifPlural(they were|it was)~ yours.
Getting more comfortable? Hey, you might as well.
Just keep your distance. I don't look as good when I do it.
Can we finally hurry this up?
Don't drag this out too long, I've got a date with my TV tonight!
Okay, next.
Thbbbtt! Thanks.
Gonna take your time? That's good for finding more treasure, I guess.
Don't forget to tackle suspicious walls if you're gonna take it slow. You might just find something good.
Shouldn't be much longer now!
Finally starting to hurry up? About time.
Now you have to give up something valuable to you. Can't imagine that.
Don't have anything worth less to you? Oh well, you should've played better.

state.text: You're catching up with Wario now!

case.state: Normally I wouldn't take your ~clothing~ as a bet, but I'll make an exception for today.
What's the matter, feeling cold? Too bad.
Yeah, yeah, let's keep going, please.
You aren't carrying anything in ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, are you? Just wondering.
Just for today, the great Wario will take anything you're willing to bet just so you can keep playing. You're welcome.
Sure, I'll take it.
Just saying, I'd happily take cash if you'd bet that instead!
Your legs come off? I bet that ability comes in handy.
I don't usually bother to remember you chumps, but I'm certain I know you for something.

state.text: Woah, watch it! If any of those bullets hits me, you're done for!
About time! Are we almost done yet?

case.state: Are we finally getting close? I'm sick of waiting.
You have to give up something more valuable now? I'd hate to be you.
You're running out of protection now. Oh well, you should've played better.
Do you need a minute? Too bad, get going!
Normally, I'd refuse if you offered your ~clothing~ instead of money. But I'll let it go today.
Now I remember you! I haven't seen you do that in years!
A zombie, huh? Hey, I can do that, too! But usually water turns me back to normal.
Does it feel drafty now? Imagine how I feel.
Excellent. Now hurry up and draw again.
This game's looking like easy money!
Heh, the game's evening out now.
Just so you know, I'd happily accept money instead if you offered!
Nice to see someone's still got something new to show us.
Well, let's see what ~name~'s got to show us!
Some competition for Wario, huh? Well, what's ~name~ offering?

state.text: You'll need to go down a bit faster to compete with Wario's good looks!

case.state: We all know I'm better looking, but hey, you tried.
But do you look as good as me? Who knows, maybe you'll find out.
Maybe you'll see later whether he looks as good as the great Wario.
Not bad. But not as good as Wario's bod!
You don't look half bad, but you'll never look as good as Wario!
Hey, not terrible. But everyone's already got me to look at.
~name~'s finally turning up the heat eh? Maybe I will be out of here soon.
It's almost over for you! What, did you think you stood a chance?
If I can't win your money, I can take your dignity instead!
Your time's running out! Try not to get embarrassed and lose now!
Have a look at ~name~! So cute!
You look like you could use a mushroom. Or maybe a garlic bottle.
I've studied so hard, my eyes have gone bad. Do you have something down there or not?
If you're trying to intimidate us, just give up now.
That's a pretty good size for a chump like you.
Hmmm, not bad.
For a loser like you? Yeah, that looks fine.
You might just stand up to Wario in size, at least!
That thing's almost as big as me, Wario!
Woah, maybe you can compete with the great Wario after all!
This game's hard, eh?
It's back! Keep that bee away from me!
Still have more to show? Lucky you.
Stubborn, eh? Oh well, that just means more fighting you.
Still playing, huh? I guess that's just more to win from you.
I get that this is a big reveal and all, but could you move it along?
You couldn't compete with my good looks anyway, so just get on with it.
My microgames are small like that but have plenty of action anyway. Maybe you're the same way.
Ha! The tracks we race karts on are less flat than you!
Wait, is my chest bigger than yours!?
Anything else to show us? Then let's get on with it.
I'll bet you'll distract someone at the table, heh heh!
Not bad, if you don't mind being number two with me at the table!
You had a lot to see, huh? Much like myself!
What I wouldn't give for those to be sacks of coins instead!
Those are as big and round as me! But I'll bet they don't have muscles like I do!

state.text: Some would call those funbags, but I think money bags deserve that name more!

case.state: No need to wonder how it feels at my level now.
Aw, couldn't keep up, huh?
I couldn't win your money, so I'll just take your ~clothing~.
The big reveal, huh? Try not to disappoint everyone here.
That's e-ah, quite the gimmick.
So that's what you losers were throwing for. I guess it could have been something weirder.
Super. Can we move on now?
Not bad. Let's see if you can still play now.
Maybe now you'll learn what happens when you challenge Wario!
If you weren't pretending to be me, you just might have gotten to keep playing, loser!
Aw, too bad! Maybe next time you won't get crushed by the real Wario!

state.text: Look who's been brought to the real Wario's level!

case.state: Now you've lost, too! You never stood a chance, chump.
Now you've lost, too. So hurry up and get out already.
Maybe if you weren't impersonating the great Wario, you wouldn't have lost that hand.
Maybe try not impersonating Wario, rookie!
You could have won that hand if you weren't pretending to be Wario.
There's plenty more where that came from, impostor.

state.text: If you weren't pretending to be Wario, you might have done better!

case.state: You couldn't even beat my pair? What a bunch of chumps!
You wish your hand was as great as Wario's!
Wario always wins!
I win! I win!
This hand's mine!
Wario, the legend!
Oh, number one, hahaha!
Ha! Rookie!
Need a lesson, loser?
Aw, couldn't focus on the game instead of the great Wario?
I know, I'm so handsome! But you should be playing the game instead of looking at me!
That's what happens when you focus on Wario and not the game.
Ha, should have focused on the game instead of me, huh?

state.text: Hey, watch where you'reâ€”Waaah!

case.state: This joker's leaving, too! Do people hate playing poker with me that much!?
Now the bucket robot thing's gone, too. What kind of micro-circus is this?
Uh huh. What's next, a Volcannon or something?
So long, plane... thing. Nice blast on the way out!
I don't know what to expect anymore. Not that I care as long as there's no more fire.
What kind of boss fight is this? We haven't even touched him yet.
Yes! Excellent hit!
Ha! I'm so awesome, I can break this pot just by looking at it!
Wa-ha! This thing's toast!
We'll take this thing down, easy-peasy!
What an excellent hat to add to my collection!
As silly as your hat looks, I'll gladly take it anyway.
Nice hat! Of course, none are as nice as my own.
Taking off your hat now? What a shame, it made you stand out.
Eh, what's this? Some kind of cleaning thing?
Wah? Who are you?
Hm, not quite. But I wasn't far off.
Next up is a flower? That's got to be the dumbest thing yet!
What, you thought I'd be surprised? My own games can look weirder than this chump.
Any more losers like them to take down? I'm getting sick of the constant dropping in and out.
Now we can finally see what this guy's got in him!
What!? Nothing!? He didn't even drop a few coins for us!
We take this guy out and he doesn't even drop a few coins? Come on!
Take your time. You've got a lot more than four seconds.
You're moving like you've got two minutes to get out of here! I know the feeling.
There's no time limit to get out of here, right? ~Name~'s sure acting like there is.

state.text: I don't mind you taking your time. That just gives you more time to admire me!

case.state: Just so you know, we have more time than a microgame!
You've taken this much of my time. No harm in taking a little more.
Three, two, one, boom! ~Name~'s just like the timer on a microgame!

state.text: You're mashing pretty fast! That's a pretty handy skill when the microgames get faster!
Faster! Faster!

case.state: Now, faster!
Don't wear yourself out!
That dog's headed for the moon!
Way to go. now you're out, too, bug.
You're done, too? Super.
Ha! No more for you!
What did you expect? No beating the legendary Wario!
What, did you think you were starting to stand a chance?
No more for you!
Now get moving. The sooner this is done, the better.
Now you get to go through this, too. So get going, punk!
You tried to beat the great Wario at poker and now you have to pay the price.
Consider yourself lucky. Usually I make people pay up for losing to me in poker.
This is what happens when you lose to Wario. Except I'll let you keep your money. This time.
That's right, you lost! Now beat it, chump!
Wouldn't you rather be making some easy cash? I sure would.
That isn't a money bag! You don't need to shake it so fast.
Is being utterly defeated what gets you going? In that case, lucky you.
You're not gonna keep rubbing that thing all day, are you?
His dance moves are the bomb, eh?
You're mashing that thing like I only gave you four seconds to finish!
Don't you think you're going a bit hard on it? It's not like it owes you money.
Were you cheating this whole time? But what did you have to gain from that?
Wait, I lost because you really were cheating!? I should throw you into next week!
Whoa, he really did explode!
A blast like that could do some real damage! Too bad he could only do it once.

state.text: Done already?

case.state: It just... exploded!
Like coins spilling out of a huge bag!
Finally decided you've had enough?
~Name~ finally quit, huh? The sooner this is over, the better.
Awww, giving up?
It's over! You lost! Wario's the best!
Hey, you done or what?
Wah, all over for you!
Now that you know what I've gone through, maybe you'll hurry up, punk.
The sooner you're done, the better. So hurry up and start!
I'm so nice, I won't even take your coins! Just don't waste my time.
That's the price you pay for challenging Wario! I guess I'll let you keep your cash.
I could have taken all your money instead. But just this once I'll only take your dignity.
Thanks for playing! Now get going or get out.
Couldn't we all be spending our time doing something else? But no, we had to play strip poker.
I hope you enjoy defeat at Wario's hand. Because clearly that's all you know!
I know you can't help but stare, but keep going.
Had enough yet? Great, let's not drag this thing out.
Where have I heard sounds like that before? Oh yeah, when I shake up the idiots in my way!
Did you enjoy Wario's good looks that much? You're welcome!
Oh my god! I lost first!?
I lost first!? So ein mist!
I can't believe I lost to a bunch of losers!
No! I hate losing!
Whatever, I'm sick of you chumps anyway.
You chumps can eat it, I'm playing my own games!
Fine, I've had enough of you cheaters anyway. I'm playing my own games now!
Mine... all mine...
Is this what you jerks came here to see?
Obey Wario... destroy Mario...
...Oh, the damage we can do... they'll never know what hit them...
You're getting very greedy... You're me, Wario! You're very handsome. You have amazing powers.
(I'm the best. The best!)
Hope you're enjoying the show. You're welcome, by the way.
A zillion coins! A castle bigger than Mario's!
It's mine... gold, I love gold!
I'm the best...
Oh yeah... Wario time...
Yes, yes! Warioooo!
Treasure! I'm filthy rich!
You cheaters happy now?
There. Have you finally had enough of Wario?
Just think: you could be having as much fun as I am!
I made this game, so it's the best game ever, you hear?
You should play my game, too. Why? Because Wario makes the greatest games!
No way they won't buy this thing! Their money's as good as mine!
You want fun? Wario'll show you fun!
Want some pointers for this? Too bad, I don't give help on my own games.
Another high score! I'm the best! Ah hahaha!
Yes! A new high score!
Wah! New high score!
This stinks! I should have won the clothes off your backs after taking all your money.

state.text: Strip poker stinks. I'm gonna go play real poker.

case.state: Instead of getting rich I won a bunch of smelly clothes. Wonderful.
I'm the best! And don't you forget it, chumps!
I don't need to play for money to beat you chumps. But thanks for playing anyway!
Bye, losers. I'm off to get rich!
Close one. But you just can't beat ol' Wario.
Just barely won, eh? Maybe I'll celebrate once I have some cash.
You didn't lose a single hand? Amazing!
I can't believe I lost to a bunch of losers like you!
I hate losing! Nyeh!
Are we done now? Let's not drag this thing out.
Congratulâ€”whatever! Can I go now?
Wario'll get you next time, bug!
Ah, strip poker stinks! I'm playing my game instead of watching you chumps.
Well, I've had enough of you chumps. I'm-a gonna play my new game instead.
My brain's as good as new, so no wrinkles! My brain power and motor skills rule because of it!
